short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official chrome extension for KnowledgeBase app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Knowledgebase** is an AI-powered Chrome extension that helps you summarize and organize all of your content. With Knowledgebase, you can easily summarize any form of content, including articles, books, podcasts, videos, and more. You can also save your summaries to a knowledgebase for easy retrieval and querying.

**Features:**

* Summarize any form of content using AI
* Save your summaries to a knowledgebase
* Query your knowledgebase using AI embeddings

**Benefits:**

* Save time by quickly summarizing long pieces of content
* Organize your knowledge in a central place
* Easily find the information you need when you need it

**Use cases:**

* Students can use Knowledgebase to summarize their textbooks and articles for easier studying.
* Professionals can use Knowledgebase to summarize research papers and industry reports for faster decision-making.
* Content creators can use Knowledgebase to summarize their research and generate new ideas for blog posts, articles, and videos.

**How to use Knowledgebase:**

1. Install the Knowledgebase Chrome extension.
2. Visit a website or open a file that contains the content you want to summarize.
3. Click the Knowledgebase icon in your Chrome toolbar.
4. Knowledgebase will generate a summary of the content and save it to your knowledgebase.


**Knowledgebase is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to save time and organize their knowledge.** Download it today and start summarizing and organizing your content with AI!
